languages.text: {n}Чародей с явной неохотой оборачивает к вам пылающий взор.{/n} "Значит, это ты так усердно спешил{mf||а} на встречу со мной и своей погибелью? Брат Сумерки, благовествую тебе: сегодня ты станешь новым Вольным Торговцем".

{n}The sorcerer reluctantly turns his burning gaze upon you.{/n} "So you are the one who was so eager to meet me and your own demise? Rejoice, Brother Twilight. Today, you become the new Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Чародей с явной неохотой оборачивает к вам пылающий взор.{/n} "Значит, это ты так усердно спешил{mf||а} на встречу со мной и своей погибелью? Брат Сумерки, благовествую тебе: сегодня ты станешь новым Вольным Торговцем".

{n}The sorcerer reluctantly turns his burning gaze upon you.{/n} "So you are the one who was so eager to meet me and your own demise? Rejoice, Brother Twilight. Today, you become the new Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}巫师不情愿地转过了视线，灼热的目光盯在你的身上。{/n}“你就是那个迫不及待想见我一面，准备死在我手上的人吗？欢呼吧，暮光兄弟，今天你就要成为新的行商浪人了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer reluctantly turns his burning gaze upon you.{/n} "So you are the one who was so eager to meet me and your own demise? Rejoice, Brother Twilight. Today, you become the new Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}巫师不情愿地转过了视线，灼热的目光盯在你的身上。{/n}“你就是那个迫不及待想见我一面，准备死在我手上的人吗？欢呼吧，暮光兄弟，今天你就要成为新的行商浪人了。”

languages.text: {n}À contrecœur, le sorcier se tourne pour poser sur vous son regard enflammé.{/n} « C'est donc vous qui aviez si hâte de me rencontrer et de mourir ? Réjouissez-vous, frère Crépuscule. Vous allez enfin devenir le nouveau libre-marchand. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer reluctantly turns his burning gaze upon you.{/n} "So you are the one who was so eager to meet me and your own demise? Rejoice, Brother Twilight. Today, you become the new Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}À contrecœur, le sorcier se tourne pour poser sur vous son regard enflammé.{/n} « C'est donc vous qui aviez si hâte de me rencontrer et de mourir ? Réjouissez-vous, frère Crépuscule. Vous allez enfin devenir le nouveau libre-marchand. »

languages.text: {n}ソーサラーはしぶしぶと燃えるような視線をこちらに向けた。{/n}「私と、自らの死と対峙することを切望しているという奴はお前か？喜べ、薄明の兄弟よ。今日からお前が新たな自由開拓者だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer reluctantly turns his burning gaze upon you.{/n} "So you are the one who was so eager to meet me and your own demise? Rejoice, Brother Twilight. Today, you become the new Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソーサラーはしぶしぶと燃えるような視線をこちらに向けた。{/n}「私と、自らの死と対峙することを切望しているという奴はお前か？喜べ、薄明の兄弟よ。今日からお前が新たな自由開拓者だ」

languages.text: {n}El hechicero, a regañadientes, gira su ardiente mirada hacia ti.{/n} «Así que eres tú quien tantas ganas tenía de conocerme y morir. Alégrate, Hermano Crepúsculo, hoy te convertirás en Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer reluctantly turns his burning gaze upon you.{/n} "So you are the one who was so eager to meet me and your own demise? Rejoice, Brother Twilight. Today, you become the new Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hechicero, a regañadientes, gira su ardiente mirada hacia ti.{/n} «Así que eres tú quien tantas ganas tenía de conocerme y morir. Alégrate, Hermano Crepúsculo, hoy te convertirás en Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: {n}Der Hexer wendet zögerlich seinen brennenden Blick zu dir.{/n} "Ihr wart also so versessen darauf, mir und damit Eurem eigenen Untergang zu begegnen? Frohlocket, Bruder Zwielicht. Heute werdet Ihr zum neuen Freihändler."
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer reluctantly turns his burning gaze upon you.{/n} "So you are the one who was so eager to meet me and your own demise? Rejoice, Brother Twilight. Today, you become the new Rogue Trader."
